mapper.select: select * from pltf_lang_kind where lk_seq=#{lkSeq} and fg_delete='N'

select a.lk_seq, b.ld_seq, b.l_seq, b.text from pltf_lang_kind a, ( select a.basename, b.* from pltf_lang a, pltf_lang_detail b where a.l_seq=#{lSeq} and a.fg_delete='N' and a.l_seq=b.l_seq and b.fg_delete='N'
) b where a.basename=b.basename and a.lk_seq=b.lk_seq and a.fg_delete='N' order by a.sort

select d.* from pltf_citem a, pltf_citem_lang_rl b, pltf_lang c, pltf_lang_detail d, pltf_lang_kind e where a.c_seq=#{cSeq} and a.fg_delete='N' and a.c_seq=b.c_seq and b.l_seq=c.l_seq and c.l_seq=d.l_seq and c.fg_delete='N' and d.lk_seq=e.lk_seq and d.fg_delete='N' and e.basename=#{basename} and e.code=#{lang} and e.fg_delete='N'
